H0.text: A boy playing with a ball is the best example of an inherited trait.

H1.text: A bird building a nest is the best example of an inherited trait.

H2.text: A horse pulling a wagon is an example of an inherited trait.

H3.text: A dog sitting on command is the best example of an inherited trait.

A4.text: Other examples include animal fighting, animal courtship behaviour, internal escape functions, and the building of nests.

A5.text: a dog can improve its listening skills by practice
